original_text: And all the people took notice of it, and it pleased them, as everything that the king did pleased all the people.
korean_text: 온 백성이 보고 기뻐하며 왕이 무슨 일을 하든지 무리가 다 기뻐하므로

sentences.original_text: And all the people took notice of it,
as everything that the king did pleased all the people.
sentences.korean_translation: 왕이 행하는 모든 것이 모든 백성을 기쁘게 했기 때문입니다.
